publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4335 Christine Grahame: Release of Ministerial Briefing Note on "Fiscal autonomy - full fiscal powers - financial independence"—That the Parliament notes the decision by coalition ministers to withhold from public scrutiny the Executive briefing note entitled "Fiscal Autonomy – full fiscal powers – financial independence" which was requested under the Freedom of Information (Scotland) Act 2002 and suggests that the reason that ministers are so coy over its release is that such a document will be likely to support the case for a free and sovereign Scottish nation; believes that its release is fundamentally in the public interest to inform the debate over Scotland’s destiny, and acknowledges that only through independence can Scotland flourish.
S2M-4335 Release of Ministerial Briefing Note on "Fiscal autonomy - full fiscal powers - financial independence" (lodged on 3 May 2006) Stewart Stevenson*, Michael Matheson*

S2M-4335 Christine Grahame: Release of Ministerial Briefing Note on "Fiscal autonomy - full fiscal powers - financial independence"—That the Parliament notes the decision by coalition ministers to withhold from public scrutiny the Executive briefing note entitled "Fiscal Autonomy – full fiscal powers – financial independence" which was requested under the Freedom of Information (Scotland) Act 2002 and suggests that the reason that ministers are so coy over its release is that such a document will be likely to support the case for a free and sovereign Scottish nation; believes that its release is fundamentally in the public interest to inform the debate over Scotland’s destiny, and acknowledges that only through independence can Scotland flourish. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Michael Matheson
S2M-4335 Release of Ministerial Briefing Note on "Fiscal autonomy - full fiscal powers - financial independence" (lodged on 3 May 2006) Linda Fabiani*

S2M-4335 Release of Ministerial Briefing Note on "Fiscal autonomy - full fiscal powers - financial independence" (lodged on 3 May 2006) Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Campbell Martin*, Jim Mather*, Rob Gibson*

S2M-4335 Release of Ministerial Briefing Note on "Fiscal autonomy - full fiscal powers - financial independence" (lodged on 3 May 2006) Brian Adam*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Alex Neil*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mr John Swinney*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-4335 Release of Ministerial Briefing Note on "Fiscal autonomy - full fiscal powers - financial independence" (lodged on 3 May 2006) Fiona Hyslop*
